headline: Take-Two Interactive (TTWO) Exceeds Market Returns: Some Facts to Consider
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Take-Two Interactive (TTWO) stood at $233.32, denoting a +1.13% change from the preceding trading day.

headline: Borderlands 4 Unveils Action-Packed Gameplay Deep Dive
summary: NEW YORK, April 30, 2025--Today, during a dedicated PlayStation’s State of Play, 2K and Gearbox Software shared an extended look at the action-packed gameplay coming in Borderlands® 4, the next entry in the iconic looter-shooter franchise. Borderlands 4 will launch on September 12, 2025, on PlayStation®5 (PS5®) console, Xbox Series X|S, and PC through Steam and the Epic Games Store. It will also be coming to Nintendo Switch 2 later in 2025.

headline: Take-Two: GTA Will Be Huge, But It May Not Be Enough
summary: Take-Two's revenue growth has been driven by acquisitions with expenses skyrocketing, leading to a significant increase in debt and poor financial performance. Learn more on TTWO stock here.
